title: ui: Add keyboard navigation between nodes

tab_navigation.description: Tab moves to next downstream node, Shift+Tab moves upstream
tab_navigation.implementation: Added Tab key handler in main.rs onkeydown that finds connected nodes via workflow.downstream_nodes() and workflow.upstream_nodes()

arrow_key_movement.description: Arrow keys move selected node by 20px grid
arrow_key_movement.implementation: Added arrowup/arrowdown/arrowleft/arrowright handlers that call workflow.move_node_by() with 20px delta

enter_config.description: Enter opens inline config panel for selected node
enter_config.implementation: Added Enter key handler that calls panels.toggle_inline_panel(node_id)

focus_indicator.description: Selected nodes show ring-2 ring-blue-500/60 focus indicator
focus_indicator.implementation: Pre-existing selection styling in FlowNodeComponent provides visible focus indicator

initial_selection.description: If no node selected, Tab selects first node
initial_selection.implementation: Added workflow.first_node_id() helper, used when Tab pressed with no selection

quality_gates.cargo_clippy: passed (pre-existing unused imports warning in ui/mod.rs)

helper_methods_added.WorkflowState::downstream_nodes: Returns Vec<NodeId> of nodes connected FROM the given node
helper_methods_added.WorkflowState::upstream_nodes: Returns Vec<NodeId> of nodes connected TO the given node
helper_methods_added.WorkflowState::move_node_by: Moves a node by dx/dy delta
helper_methods_added.WorkflowState::first_node_id: Returns first node ID or None
